Papers

  • Title: SAJaS - Bridging the Gap between MAS Simulation and Development using a JADE-based API for Repast
  • Authors: João P. C. Lopes, Henrique Lopes Cardoso, João S. V. Gonçalves
  • Status: Submitted to MATES but Rejected.
  • paper_api_joao_lopes.pdf

Project GitHub Repositories

SAJaS is the core of my project. It consists of an API for use in simulation frameworks that enable MAS features present in JADE to be used on them.

MASSim2Dev is an eclipse plugin that converts Repast simulations based on SAJaS into JADE applications as seamlessly as possible.

I use a third repository to keep track of my test scenarios.

Project Java docs (Under production)
